name: A Migrant's Lullaby
description:
Migrant's Lullaby is game that attempts to tackle the immigration crisis that the United States is currently facing. Not many people know how difficult it is to gain legal entry or, the struggles that illegal immigrants from South America face. As narrative lead and lead level designer, I sought ways to make such a difficult topic a little bit easier to understand and digest. For this reason, i chose to write the game in the style of a lullaby

I worked with a local nonprofit that sponsored immigrant families from South America in order to make sure all my information and scenarios were authentic.
